br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens

Class BattleScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.BaseScreen
      • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.BattleScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BattleTutorial, Practice

    public class BattleScreen
extends BaseScreen
    Establishes the interaction between the game and the player. It shows the items in the logic layer and acts as a listener for the Controller class.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.BaseScreen
